name: eschillus-syntax
readme:
# Eschillus Syntax Theme
## Description
This is a __Syntax Theme__ for Atom Code Editor, currently in development by Eschillus. Eschillus Syntax Theme was created with the developers focus in mind.

## Installing the theme
<<<<<<< HEAD
Use ``$ apm install eschillus-syntax`` in __terminal/command line__ to install the theme.
=======
### Terminal
Simply type: 
```
apm install eschillus-syntax
``` 
in __terminal/command line__ to install the theme.
### With Atom
>>>>>>> 54451428af23c4bc58642d32c2295be872c658a9
You can also install the theme through atom by clicking [this](https://atom.io/themes/eschillus-syntax) link.

## Issues/Bugs
If you find that something doesn't seem right feel free to create an issue on GitHub.
And if you have any overall feedback you can create and issue as well.
